events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I would like to request a refund because the size is completely wrong and doesn't fit me at all.
The customer reported a problem regarding returning a product and requesting their money back due to incorrect sizing.
Customer support agent Laura has been assigned to handle the refund request case for the jacket order.
Hello! I’m Laura from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket due to sizing issues. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging so we can proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and yes, the jacket is brand new, still with all tags attached, and I haven’t worn it outside.
Thank you for the information. We can gladly process your refund. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks so much for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. The amount should appear in your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if you have any further questions or need assistance.
Since you have confirmed receipt of the refund and no further concerns were raised, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting support!
